summary: The customer is looking to purchase a phone from Contoso Wireless and was given information about the company's flagship product, the Contoso Wireless Prime. The Prime has a powerful processor, advanced camera capabilities, and an intuitive user interface. It also has several security measures and pre-installed apps to help users stay organized and connected on the go. The customer was also informed that Contoso Wireless offers complimentary setup assistance from their technical support team once the device is purchased.
